subject: RE: Legal Aid
body:
Ok. 
 
Thanks!
Alsu
 
From:
 Randall Stieghorst <r.stieghorst@lcwmail.com> 
Sent:
 Thursday, December 16, 2021 11:47 AM
To:
 Jose Guardado <j.guardado@lcwmail.com>
Cc:
 Alsu Schondelmayer <a.schondelmayer@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 RE: Legal Aid
 
I see, Jose, thank you. Going forward, if the delivery date and billable date are not correct (as in this case, when you were waiting to clarify them), please do not include them…and definitely don’t leave the status as “OK”, as this ends up being factored into current projections.
 
Alsu, please keep your eye out for these types of irregularities in dates, so that we can be sure not to include them in the wrong projections.
 
Thanks,
R
 
 
From:
 Jose Guardado <
j.guardado@lcwmail.com
> 
Sent:
 Thursday, December 16, 2021 11:12 AM
To:
 Randall Stieghorst <
r.stieghorst@lcwmail.com
>
Cc:
 Alsu Schondelmayer <
a.schondelmayer@lcwmail.com
>
Subject:
 RE: Legal Aid
 
Hi Randy,
 
Thanks for checking. That was an entry we were waiting for delivery date. Here is the screen capture of what entries for Legal Aid Society should reflect currently.
 
 
 
Hope this helps.
 
Thanks,
José
 
José Guardado

subject: FW: Scheduling your IDI Debrief
body:
Hey José,
 
Quick turnaround from Lauren from SBD.
 
Can you do Monday anytime? Your calendar looks open so, just wanna check!
 
CW
 
From:
 Boedeker, Lauren <Lauren.Boedeker@sbdinc.com> 
Sent:
 Thursday, December 16, 2021 9:17 AM
To:
 IDI Coaching @ LCW <idi@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 RE: Scheduling your IDI Debrief
 
Hi Conner,
 
I am on Central Time and I have availability Monday 12/20 all day. I also have availability Tuesday 12/21 – Thursday 12/23 after 11am both days. 
 
I will be out the following week so I’m open to scheduling something after the New Year as well! 
 
Thanks!
Lauren 
 
From:
 IDI Coaching @ LCW <
idi@lcwmail.com
> 
Sent:
 Thursday, December 16, 2021 9:07 AM
To:
 Boedeker, Lauren <
Lauren.Boedeker@sbdinc.com
>
Subject:
 Scheduling your IDI Debrief
 
***CAUTION: EXTERNAL MESSAGE***
 
Hello Lauren,
 
I hope you are well.
 
Thank you for completing the IDI Assessment. The next step is to schedule your 1:1 Debrief session with an LCW Facilitator. Could you please send over some 1- hour timeslots in the next week or so that you are available for this debrief session? Please, include your time zone.
 
Once I have received your times, I will coordinate with the facilitators and send you an invitation for the time that works best.
 
Please, let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
 
Thank you,
 
Conner Williams
Associate Consultant
LCW 
100 S Saunders Rd, Suite 150
Lake Forest, IL 60045 USA
Gender pronouns: He/Him/His

subject: RE: Invoice:  Emerson 2021-24 / IDI Debriefs
body:
Thank you Brian. 
 
Jose  – please approve, and I’ll process invoice for payment. 
 
 
Thanks!
Alsu
 
From:
 Brian Schroeder <brian.schroeder@ncgglobal.com> 
Sent:
 Wednesday, December 15, 2021 9:27 AM
To:
 Jose Guardado <j.guardado@lcwmail.com>; Alsu Schondelmayer <a.schondelmayer@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 Invoice: Emerson 2021-24 / IDI Debriefs
 
Hi Jose and Alsu
 
 
Thank you for being able to serve Emerson again on their inclusion work this year.  I enjoyed working with them.
 
Since we've completed all deliveries for the year, I've attached an invoice for the sessions delivered.
 
If you have any questions, please get in touch.
 
Best regards
 
Brian

subject: RE: Quick Inquiry - French language facilitation
body:
I might be able to do it…if the material is translated, I am perfectly capable of delivering it in French.
 
As for the other resources in French, you’d have to consult the master list!
 
From:
 Jose Guardado <j.guardado@lcwmail.com> 
Sent:
 Wednesday, December 15, 2021 9:51 AM
To:
 Sarah Nodarse <s.nodarse@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 Quick Inquiry - French language facilitation
 
Hi Sarah,
 
Happy Wednesday!
 
Curious if you are a resource that could deliver “Working with France” content in French? If not you, can you direct me to some possible resources? Simply assessing our capability with content that would be translated and delivered in that language.
 
Thanks,
 
José Guardado

LCW
